snippet: The National YoungArts Foundation will create a new home centered on two colorful Modernist landmarks in Miami.
abstract: Architect Frank Gehry will design an arts complex for the National YoungArts Foundation on the site of Bacardi's former corporate campus in Miami; original building's exteriors are landmarked and will be left intact.
lead_paragraph: The National YoungArts Foundation will create a new home centered on two colorful Modernist landmarks in Miami.

headline.seo: National YoungArts to Take Over Bacardi Complex in Miami
headline.main: Gehry to Turn Bacardi Complex Into Arts Campus
headline.print_headline: Gehry to Turn Bacardi Complex Into Arts Campus
